column4: Jrib: That would run them one after the other, would it not? I want to run them both at the same time. As an example, I'm installing a program right now (35MB) which if I cancel I would have to restart the download, but I also want do apt-get upgrade to upgrade existing installed programs
Iceroot: I believe that means the application is malfunctioning
Iceroot: Upgrade is what you want to update existing packages
i dont want to upgrade/update is was answering a question
